original_text: And all they of the land came to a wood; and there was honey upon the ground.
korean_text: 그들이 다 수풀에 들어간즉 땅에 꿀이 있더라

sentences.original_text: And all they of the land came to a wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅의 모든 사람들이 숲으로 왔고

sentences.original_text: and there was honey upon the ground
